mapper.select:
SELECT IDX , MENU_ID
, DECODE( LVL, 0, '', '[Re] ' ) || TITLE AS TITLE
, WRITER , TO_CHAR( REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGDATE , READCOUNT , BNUM , LVL , STEP , NREF , DELNUM FROM BOARD
WHERE MENU_ID = #{ menu_id }
ORDER BY NREF DESC , STEP ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( IDX, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONT, WRITER, REGDATE, READCOUNT, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF, PARENT ) VALUES ( ( SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX), 0) + 1 FROM BOARD ), #{ menu_id }, #{ title }, #{ cont }, #{ writer }, sysdate, 0, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX), 0) + 1 FROM BOARD ), 0, 0, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX), 0) + 1 FROM BOARD ), 0 )
